edge: Adam Sandler portrays the character Donny Berger in this movie.
Ady Samberg portrays the character Todd Peterson, who is revealed to also be known as Han Solo Berger.
Leighton Meester acts as Jamie Martin in the movie.
Milo Ventimiglia plays the role of Chad Martin, Jamie's younger brother.
Blake Clark performs as Gerald in the movie.
Meagen Fay portrays Helen, Jamie and Chad's mother.
Tony Orlando acts as Steve Spirou in the movie.
Will Forte portrays Phil in the film.
Rachel Dratch performs as Phil's wife in the movie.
Nick Swardson plays Kenny in this movie.
Peggy Stewart acts as Grandma Delores in the movie.
Ciara portrays Brie, a bartender and Donny's friend, Todd's secondary love interest in the movie.
Ana Gasteyer portrays Mrs. Ravensdale in this movie.
Susan Sarandon acts as Mary McGarricle (present-day), Donny's middle school teacher/lover and Todd's mother in the movie.
Todd Bridges appears as himself in this movie.
Dan Patrick portrays Randall Morgan's receptionist in the movie.
Peter Dante performs as Dante Spirou, Steve's son in the film.
Colin Quinn performs as the Strip club DJ in this movie.
Vanilla Ice appears as himself in the movie.
